service-feature-text-1: Buhlercompany transports cargo in a variety of ways.
service-feature-text-3: The company provides high-quality transfer of small cargo.

stage-1.title: Submitting your application
stage-1.text: Apply for a position online, and our manager will get in touch with you.

stage-2.title: Entering into a contract
stage-2.text: We enter into a formal and legally valid contract. We work with legal entities and individuals. Payment is made by non-cash methods.

stage-3.title: Monitoring and tracking
stage-3.text: Our manager informs you about every step of the cargo movement. You can also track it yourself.

stage-4.title: Cargo delivery
stage-4.text: Delivery and shipment of cargo occurs in accordance with the transit time of the company.

choose.title: Why choose us
choose.text: Our transportation company Buhlercompany carries out international shipments. We perform transportation of goods of all kinds and in all directions. We are one of the leading companies that control the supply chain. Employees of the Buhlercompany develop and implement the latest ideas and solutions in the field of organization and management of transportation. We provide individuals and companies with a range of timely and guaranteed delivery services. We are constantly improving the level of service, introducing new technologies, effectively using internal potential and external resources. Thus, the cohesion of the team of professionals is perfect for implementing a system of mass participation!

spec-1.title: Guaranteed price and delivery time
spec-1.text: We value our customers' time, therefore we work in compliance with all our deadlines

spec-2.title: Any cargo volume
spec-2.text: Delivery and shipment takes place in accordance with the company's transit time

spec-3.title: Advantageous terms of cargo insurance
spec-3.text: Rest assured, we will insure your cargo against all accidents
